sentences.sContent: In his youth his father bound him out to a tailor.
sentences.sContent_eng: In his youth his father bound him out to a tailor.
sentences.sCn: 他年轻时他父亲叫他去给一个裁缝当学徒。

sentences.sContent: ...But in single-sex schools teachers can tailor lessons to boys' learning style...

words.tran: 定做的；裁缝做的；剪裁讲究的
[服装] 剪裁，做衣服；裁缝业，成衣业
裁制；调整使适应（tailor的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tranOther: someone whose job is to make men’s clothes, that are measured to fit each customer perfectly
